lexUnit.name: meaning.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: what is meant by a linguistic expression

sentence.text: Words have different meanings in different contexts .
Mr. Leonard contended that the expression ` office or employment " is a term of art to be construed in accordance with its established legal meanings in other contexts .
She 'd never really understood the meaning behind the adage -- until now .
The multiplicity of utterance meanings does not mean that any linguistic expression can mean anything at all in complete disregard of what it means as a sentence .

The story makes some very profound points about the role of ritual in religion , the development of conceptual understanding , the meaning of the word " spiritual " and how it is related to religion .
Word meanings are especially liable to change because people learn them by hearing them in context rather than by looking up the ` standard " definition , and the inferences they draw can vary .

Many of the words used in palaeography have broad meanings in normal English usage , or may be used in more than one way .

It should be said at the outset that this is not the usual legal meaning of the word .

Natural language semantics can be defined as the study of the meaning of utterances , and to this end a number of semantic theories have been proposed .
The third meaning of the word ` power " is ` discretion " .
